prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Piano, Bass, Drums, Guitar, but without Pipe.
captions:
Style 1:
This piece of music features Piano, Bass, Drums, and Guitar, but no Pipe.

Style 2:
This song is composed of Piano, Bass, Drums, and Guitar, omitting Pipe.

Style 3:
This composition is Piano, Bass, Drums, and Guitar, Pipe excluded.
